No offense meant, but why did you guys not reach out to Yahoo or ESPN to help with this, you guys seem to be struggling and sort of ruining the experience for people who have been locked out and stuff? Maybe you guys did, just a thought that might have helped this.
I Created a league yesterday, and now it is gone
We're sorry for this but if  your league was created yesterday but you didn't complete a draft by 3AM PDT, we had to delete your league due to technical difficulties with the site.
Hey, a beta is a beta for a reason right?

"Live drafting is temporarily closed as we've reached peak number of concurrent drafts. Availability should open up in the next 15-30 minutes, so check back shortly!" the last 2 days.. plz riot

Live drafting is temporarily closed as we've reached peak number of concurrent drafts. Availability should open up in the next 15-30 minutes, so check back shortly!
.... waiting since 4-5 hours now
The fantasy league says check back top of every hour to create a league but i have been checking and refresing for past two hours but still not able to create one....
i cant make a league still ;_;

This is literally just pathetic, riot get your crapp together. Don't hype stuff up if you can't deliver. Making fantasy leagues is one of THE MOST BASIC things you can do and you guys cant even get it right to let everyone play. I think RP sent to every account on game would make it fair compensation for everyone who misses out on YOUR mistakes
report for flame

can the fantasy devs make it easier for me to compare current stats of my bench vs my starters? maybe include the bench's points in the matchup drop down. other than that, you guys are doing a great job! from a frequent sports fantasy player, LoL fantasy is looking great!

fantasy is a game based off of stats, and it would be nice to see current or past stats (not estimates) of every player. it is very hard to keep up with whether my starters or bench are better. also, it would be nice if a trade option is available.

Unfortunately, the Fantasy LOL LCS doesn't actually feel like a Fantasy Team, but more like pick your favorite EU/NA player and see how they do overall against someone else.

The Aspect of a Fantasy team is to actually manage it and make trades, and work the value of your team, this is just "pick your favorites of what is left, cross your fingers, and hope for the best!"
I understand that this is a beta and it is going to have issues but could we at least receive some updates on what, if anything, is being done to fix the site?
site crash op
